name: Night Flyer: A Bat’s Journey
description:
Play as a nimble bat and take to the skies in search of fruits and moths. Try to survive as your world disappears.  Bats are often misunderstood creatures, being demonized or vilified in media,  but they have an important  job in  our planet's ecosystem.  I hope that  by playing Night Flyer it will help shed new light on our furry  little neighbors.

FEATURES:

Story Mode - Adapt as a baby bat and go through life. 

Timed Challenge - Engage your bat skills to beat the high score. 

Educational Resource - Bats need protection! Learn useful bat trivial while gaining information on  bat conservation efforts.

Please use the keyboard to play. The game jam entry does not support mobile devices yet.
